title: A new contact is not added on the contact list when the current user has is QR code scanned by others users.
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: 
A new contact (User A) is not added on the current user's contact list when User A scanned the current user's QR code and confirmed the addition of a new contact.

#### Expected behavior
The current user should see the new contact (User A) on the "Contacts" page.

#### Actual behavior
The current user cannpt see the new contact (User A) on the "Contacts" page.

### Reproduction

- Open Status as New user 1 (Android phone).
- Open Status as New user 2 (iOS phone).
- Create a new account as User 1, select a password and confirm the password.
- Create a new account as User 2, select a password and confirm the password..
- As User 2 (previously new User 2) leave the chat, select the hamburger menu at the top left of the app, edit the profile and tap "Show QR code".
- As User 1 (previously new User 1) leave the chat, select "Contacts" tab, click the "+" to add a new contact, confirm ny taping the pencil icon, then tap "Scan QR code".
- As User 1 tap the tick at the top right of the new contact page, the chat with User 2 is opened.
- As User 1, tap the back button twice "<" until the "Contacts" page is displayed, tap "XX more" (where XX is the number of contacts, "11 contacts" is displayed) to expand the contact list, you will see User 2 name.
- As User 2 tap "Done" on the QR code page then "<" to leave the profile, select "Contacts" tab, tap "XX more" (where XX is the number of contacts, "10 contacts" is displayed) to expand the contact list, you will not see User 1 name displayed

### Additional Information
* Status version: 
Status version: Nightly build: 0.9.10-432-g2bd7652b+
Samsung Galaxy S6 & iPhone SE
* Operating System: Android version: 6.0.1 & IOS version: 11.1.2
